Get.summary: Retrieves the status and configuration parameters in regards to the (specified) USB Interface.

99.description: A well-formed call was performed to a valid object with valid arguments.

ARGUMENT_DATA_TYPE_MISMATCH.description: A call attempt to a valid object and procedure was performed, however an argument value was provided with an unexpected data type, therefore it was not possible to process the request.

ARGUMENT_NOT_FOUND.description: A call to a valid object and procedure was performed, however an unrecognized argument was provided, therefore it was not possible to process the request.

ARGUMENT_REQUIRED_MISSING.description: A call to a valid object and procedure was performed, however a required argument was not provided, therefore it was not possible to process the request.

ARGUMENT_VALUE_NOT_SUPPORTED.description: A call attempt to a valid object and procedure was performed, however a non-supported argument value was provided, therefore it was not possible to process the request.

METHOD_NOT_FOUND.description: A call to a valid object but non-existing procedure was performed, therefore it was not possible to process the request.

OBJECT_NOT_FOUND.description: A call to a non-existing object was performed, therefore it was not possible to process the request.

OK.description: A well-formed request to an authorized resource was performed, and the receiver was able to compute the response within the allowed time-window.

OPERATION_ALREADY_IN_PROGRESS.description: A well-formed request to an authorized resource was performed, however the operation could not be completed, as the required resource was temporarily locked by a different request in progress.

OPERATION_ERROR.description: A well-formed request was performed however, it was not possible to process the request due to an unknown internal error.

OPERATION_ILLEGAL.description: A well-formed request to an authorized resource was performed, however the operation could not be completed, as it was invoked in the incorrect system state or order.

OPERATION_PERMISSION_DENIED.description: A well-formed request was performed however, the client did not meet the security conditions required to access the protected resource, therefore it is not possible to process the request.

OPERATION_TIMEOUT.description: A well-formed request was performed however, it was not possible to process the response within the allowed time-frame.

Set.summary: Modifies the status and configuration parameters of the (specified) USB Interface.

99.description: A well-formed call was performed to a valid object with valid arguments.

ARGUMENT_DATA_TYPE_MISMATCH.description: A call attempt to a valid object and procedure was performed, however an argument value was provided with an unexpected data type, therefore it was not possible to process the request.

ARGUMENT_NOT_FOUND.description: A call to a valid object and procedure was performed, however an unrecognized argument was provided, therefore it was not possible to process the request.

ARGUMENT_REQUIRED_MISSING.description: A call to a valid object and procedure was performed, however a required argument was not provided, therefore it was not possible to process the request.

ARGUMENT_VALUE_NOT_SUPPORTED.description: A call attempt to a valid object and procedure was performed, however a non-supported argument value was provided, therefore it was not possible to process the request.

METHOD_NOT_FOUND.description: A call to a valid object but non-existing procedure was performed, therefore it was not possible to process the request.

OBJECT_NOT_FOUND.description: A call to a non-existing object was performed, therefore it was not possible to process the request.

OK.description: A well-formed request to an authorized resource was performed, and the receiver was able to compute the response within the allowed time-window.

OPERATION_ALREADY_IN_PROGRESS.description: A well-formed request to an authorized resource was performed, however the operation could not be completed, as the required resource was temporarily locked by a different request in progress.

OPERATION_ERROR.description: A well-formed request was performed however, it was not possible to process the request due to an unknown internal error.

OPERATION_ILLEGAL.description: A well-formed request to an authorized resource was performed, however the operation could not be completed, as it was invoked in the incorrect system state or order.

OPERATION_PERMISSION_DENIED.description: A well-formed request was performed however, the client did not meet the security conditions required to access the protected resource, therefore it is not possible to process the request.

OPERATION_TIMEOUT.description: A well-formed request was performed however, it was not possible to process the response within the allowed time-frame.

Limit.description: How many items to return at one time (max 200)

Offset.description: Which object index to start with

Status.possible_values:
- "Disabled", the interface is disabled.
- "Connected", the interface is enabled and there is one device connected.
- "Disconnected", the interface is enabled but there are no devices connected.

Type.possible_values: "OHCI" (Open Host Controller Interface), "EHCI" (Enhanced Host Controller Interface), "UHCI" (Universal Host Controller Interface) or "xHCI" (Extensible Host Controller Interface).

Version.description: USB Interface version or release number.

1.description: Raised when an existing USB Interface is disabled.

2.description: Raised when an existing USB Interface is enabled.

3.description: Raised when an existing USB Interface is modified.

4.description: Raised when a USB Interface Port is disabled.

5.description: Raised when a USB Interface Port is enabled.

6.description: Raised when the USB Interface is connected to a device.

7.description: Raised when the USB Interface is disconnected from a device.
